name: css-column-rule-width
description: Css module of single purpose classes for column rule width

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-column-rule-width.css > css/css-column-rule-width.css && tachyons src/css-column-rule-width.css --minify > css/css-column-rule-width.min.css && tachyons src/css-column-rule-width.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
